194 Days of Calligraphy

On August 30th, I took a 2-hour Calligraphy workshop at Wordshop in Denver. It’s been six months since I first used a pointed Calligraphy pen and I wanted to share my growth! Why Calligraphy? I wanted to add hand lettering to my design skills. I always felt like I was lacking in typography layout. I took a few classes on Skillshare and some other places, but it just never clicked.
